title: [HBA] Develop Blockchain Student Hub in 10 universities
summary:
• Students lack structured, credible blockchain learning paths.
• Unitour events are fragmented and don’t build long-term growth.
• Cardano’s education efforts still lack strong media visibility.
solution:
• Cardano’s Unitour will run within Club system.
• HBA’s formal mandate provides strong legitimacy for student activities.
• Cardano gains improved visibility across mainstream media.
proposer_name: Ho Chi Minh City Blockchain Association
proposer_relevant_experience:
# **Lead 1: Mr\. Tran Xuan Tien**
**Responsibilities:**

- Overall Project Management & Execution: Serve as the General Secretary overseeing the entire program, managing daily operations, logistics, and ensuring alignment between the HBA board and the project team.
- Official Representation & Media Relations: Act as the official spokesperson and representative for the HBA, directly responsible for Public Relations (PR) and managing media content, supporting the goal of securing mainstream press coverage.
- Institutional & Partner Engagement: Manage communication and consensus-building between the student clubs, HBA leadership, and external partners, strengthening the program's legitimacy.
- Knowledge Dissemination: Actively participate in educational events and panels to share expertise on the cryptocurrency market and blockchain technology, enhancing curriculum credibility.

**Qualifications:**

- Executive Management: General Secretary of the HCMC Blockchain Association (HBA), demonstrating proven capacity for high-level organizational management, administration, and project execution.
- Journalism & Media Expertise: Possesses 8 years of experience in the journalism/media industry, providing deep insight into mainstream communication channels and crisis management skills.
- Public Profile & Authority: Highly reputable expert in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space, frequently participating in official panel discussions and forums.
- Communication & Advocacy: Experienced official spokesperson, validating the ability to effectively convey the value proposition of HBA and Cardano to the broader business and public community.

# **Lead 2: Mr\. Bui Quang Tinh Tu**
**LinkedIn: **[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/tinhtu/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tinhtu/)

**Responsibilities:**

- Overall Project Leadership: Manage and oversee the entire project, ensuring the establishment, operation, and sustainable growth of 5 Student Blockchain Clubs are on track and within budget.
- Marketing & Scaling Strategy: Responsible for designing and executing the marketing strategy to achieve the 1M+ Media Reach KPI, including attracting and managing mainstream media partnerships.
- Educational Content Development: Oversee the quality and professionalism of the educational content, specifically the "Blockchain Handbook", ensuring its suitability for digital transformation and blockchain education within academic settings.
- Community Engagement: Design the mechanisms for engaging and sustaining the club communities, converting promising students into active contributors to the Cardano ecosystem.

**Qualifications:**

- Executive-Level Experience (CEO): Currently the CEO of Conversion Asia (Marketing and Digital Transformation consulting firm), demonstrating capacity for strategic planning and complex project management.
- Scalable Growth Expertise: Former Chief Growth Officer (CGO) at JobHopin, with direct experience in building and scaling business/community initiatives effectively.
- Mass Community Building Capability: Founder of the UAN (Underground Agency Network), one of Vietnam’s largest professional marketing communities, confirming the unique ability to organize, manage, and mobilize large-scale audiences.
- Extensive Experience: Over 10 years of experience in Marketing, Digital Transformation, and Community leadership.
- Public Authority: Recognized as a TEDx Speaker, enhancing the credibility and authority of all program events and public outreach activities.



# Cardano Vietnam will partner with HBA in human-resource training and development.
**About Cardano Vietnam**

Cardano Vietnam is a long-standing, sustainable community dedicated to education, technical training, builder development, and the expansion of the Cardano ecosystem in Vietnam. Led by Cardano Ambassadors, the community has built an extensive network across universities, technology clubs, Web3 startups, and domestic blockchain partners.

As an event partner and a collaborator in applying Cardano Blockchain technology, Cardano Vietnam will take on the following roles:

Developer onboarding and practical training: wallet creation, testnet interaction, transaction execution, introductions to Plutus and Hydra, and setting up development environments.

- Ecosystem education: governance, Project Catalyst, treasury mechanisms, and funding opportunities for startups and emerging project teams.

- Enterprise advisory: supporting traditional businesses and startups in adopting Cardano Blockchain solutions.

- Content development and localization: producing high-quality Vietnamese materials for students, developers, founders, and ADA holders.

- Event and community media support: promoting activities, amplifying communication across social channels, and engaging participants.

- Collaboration with universities, developer communities, and Web3 partners to help Cardano reach broader user groups across Vietnam.

- With a strong network and consistent training and communication efforts, Cardano Vietnam plays a critical role in attracting new builders and supporting businesses in adopting Cardano technology.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- We aim to build a future talent pipeline for Ho Chi Minh City by bringing foundational Blockchain knowledge to students across universities.

- By partnering with universities, HBA is establishing a network of Blockchain Clubs on campus. HBA will serve as an advisor, providing **structured programs and clear learning pathways** for students interested in Blockchain.

- **Cardano’s activities will be organized within this system**, allowing value to be accumulated and expanded through each initiative over time.

- All educational activities related to Cardano will also be featured in **mainstream media**, strengthening Cardano’s presence and credibility in Vietnam.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- Formal University MOUs: Establish and finalize official Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) with at least **5 top\-tier universities** in Ho Chi Minh City to formally authorize the establishment of **student blockchain clubs\.**
- Government Alignment & Recognition: Leverage the HBA's authority to actively integrate the program's activities into the official operational plans of key competent governmental agencies (e.g., **Ho Chi Minh City Digital Transformation Center**) to ensure institutional recognition.
- Educational Events: Organize and host at least 5 large-scale educational events (combining academic workshops and public meetups) over 12 months, featuring official HBA.
- On-Chain Certification: Design, mint, and issue **800\+ NFT** Certificates to students completing the structured training.
- The Unitour series, sponsored by Cardano, will focus on themes such as career opportunities in the blockchain industry.

Media support will include featuring the Unitour events, along with Cardano’s presence—on official and mainstream media channels.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- Community Infrastructure: Establish and formalize **5 dedicated Blockchain Student Clubs** at major universities, officially recognized by their institutions and partnered with the Ho Chi Minh City Blockchain Association (HBA).
- Media & Outreach Reach: Achieve **1,000,000\+ **total cumulative impressions/reach across mainstream and social media channels (views, pictures, and engagement data) for all program activities.
- Ecosystem Conversion (On-Chain): Directly convert students into verifiable contributors by issuing **800\+ NFT Certificate**, serving as proof of skills acquired during the workshops.
- Foundational Recognition: Formally recognize and **award 5\-10 key individuals, including Cardano Representatives/Foundations,** for their significant contributions to the development and growth of the Blockchain community in Ho Chi Minh City.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
The Government has designated blockchain as a strategic technology within the National Digital Transformation agenda. Ten research and training institutions have been established or upgraded to develop a dedicated **human\-resource strategy for blockchain**. The technology has also been incorporated into the official curricula of universities, colleges, vocational schools, and research centers.



Under **Decision No\. 1236/QĐ\-TTg**, the Prime Minister approved the National Strategy for the Application and Development of Blockchain Technology through 2025, with orientation toward 2030.

# **Problem perception**
- The adoption of blockchain technology in Vietnam has accelerated in recent years. However, university students, who represent the future talent pipeline of the industry currently lack structured and credible pathways to access blockchain education and practical experience.
- Separate, one-off Unitour activities do not create a consistent pathway for students to grow or accumulate meaningful value in Blockchain. Without a unified hub, students lack a place to develop, connect, and progress in a structured way.
- At the same time, Cardano’s educational initiatives in Vietnam have not yet translated into strong, legitimate visibility or presence in mainstream media.

# Our approach
- Cardano’s Unitour series will be organized within the official structure of the Blockchain Club system, coordinated by HBA in partnership with universities.
- As an official association established under the governance of the HCMC Electronic Media Association, the HBA provides the project with an unprecedented level of institutional legitimacy within Vietnam's regulatory environment. This formal mandate ensures that the student-focused activities are not merely grassroots initiatives but are instead officially sanctioned and supported by a recognized local authority.
- This ensures Cardano’s activities are continuously accumulated, expanded, and sustained over time—while also being featured in mainstream media, elevating Cardano’s visibility and reputation to a new level in Vietnam.

# Target engagement
- Future Blockchain Workforce from University Students

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
# **Legitimacy**
HBA is the official and government-recognized blockchain organization in Ho Chi Minh City. All of HBA’s activities are conducted under this formal mandate. Therefore, participation in these initiatives elevates the credibility and positioning of Cardano within the local ecosystem.

# **Media Impact**
HBA’s activities consistently generate strong mainstream media coverage, something Cardano has not fully leveraged in Vietnam in recent years. Through this project, Cardano will gain official, high-visibility exposure across major press channels.

# **Community Expansion**
Community growth begins with establishing Blockchain Clubs at universities. As these student communities take shape and mature, they gain exposure to various ecosystems and can choose the ones that best fit their interests. If Cardano delivers strong value and visibility, these communities can naturally evolve into future contributors and builders within the Cardano ecosystem—fueling long-term growth and expansion.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
- HBA is the official blockchain organization with the sole mission of promoting blockchain adoption in Ho Chi Minh City.

Our partners for conducting this survey include both government and non-government organizations such as the Ho Chi Minh City Digital Transformation Center (DXC).

- We are also collaborating with the Institute of Copyright Technology and Digital Assets to provide expert consultation on the educational content designed for students.
- Each phase of the program will include clearly defined milestones to ensure structured progress and measurable outcomes.

# **Team capabilities**
- From a technical standpoint, we receive expert guidance from the Institute’s team, along with support from a strong lineup of highly qualified blockchain specialists in Vietnam.
- The event organizer has a proven track record of delivering large-scale conferences, including Conviction, the number one blockchain conference in Vietnam, which attracted more than 30,000 attendees.

# **Previous work**
- Conviction: the largest crypto and AI event in Vietnam in 2024, attracting more than 30,000 attendees.
- Unitour Series: a high-quality educational roadshow hosted across major universities, designed to provide students with advanced knowledge in blockchain and emerging technologies.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Due to anticipated market conditions, we propose using an estimated ADA price of **$0.40 **to ensure the project’s feasibility and proper execution. At this rate, 60,000 ADA is equivalent to approximately **$24,000\.**



The projected program cost is around **$29,000**, and we plan to secure additional socialized funding to cover the remaining expenses.



Below is the detailed budget breakdown for the program: [https://docs\.google\.com/spreadsheets/d/1lnXugoh5ivSujzhGUkjtwuBPWQJv3v6alr6L7BOwwDs/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lnXugoh5ivSujzhGUkjtwuBPWQJv3v6alr6L7BOwwDs/edit?usp=sharing)



- PRODUCTION & PRINTING: Standee, Backdrop, Leaflet, Handheld Hashtag: 2,000 ADA.
- DESIGN & ADAPTATION: Design (Backdrop, Standee, leaflet), Design adaptation: 6,000 ADA.
- MEDIA: Media team (Photo, Video): 6,000 ADA.
- HR SUPPORT & LOGISTIC: Booth Supporter: Transport, Media team (Video): 2,500 ADA.
- GAME: Engagement Activity, Sport Game, Falling Stick Reaction Game: 1,500 ADA.
- PROJECT MANAGEMENT: 5,000 ADA.
- COMMUNICATION: Press Release, PR Article, Interview Cardano Contributor, Campaign (Collab with HBA): 45,000  ADA.
